Austria.name: Lockdown ordered
Austria.description: Banning all access to public spaces and gatherings of more than 5 people. Advice to maintain 1m distance.

Austria.name: Social distancing encouraged
Austria.description: Recommendation to maintain a distance of 1m.

sources: Bundesministerium. Coronavirus (COVID-19): Status quo – Schulen, Hochschulen, Universitäten und Forschungsinstitutionen. https://www.bmbwf.gv.at/Ministerium/Informationspflicht/corona/corona_status.html.

Austria.name: Public events banned
Austria.description: Banning of gatherings of more than 5 people.
sources: Henley, J. Coronavirus: EU states enact tough measures to stem spread. The Guardian https://www.theguardian.com/world/2020/mar/10/coronavirus-several-eu-states-ban-mass-eventsafter-italian-lockdown (2020).

Belgium.name: Lockdown ordered
Belgium.description: Citizens are required to stay at home except for work and essential journeys. Going outdoors only with household members or 1 friend.

Belgium.name: Social distancing encouraged
Belgium.description: Public transport recommended only for essential journeys, work from home encouraged, all public places e.g. restaurants closed.
sources: Federal Public Service. Coronavirus : Phase 2 maintained, transition to the federal phase and additional measures. https://www.info-coronavirus.be/en/2020/03/12/phase-2-maintainedtransition-to-the-federal-phase-and-additional-measures/ (2020)

Belgium.name: School closure ordered
sources: Federal Public Service. Coronavirus : Phase 2 maintained, transition to the federal phase and additional measures. https://www.info-coronavirus.be/en/2020/03/12/phase-2-maintainedtransition-to-the-federal-phase-and-additional-measures/ (2020)

Belgium.name: Public events banned
Belgium.description: All recreational activities cancelled regardless of size.
sources: Federal Public Service. Coronavirus : Phase 2 maintained, transition to the federal phase and additional measures. https://www.info-coronavirus.be/en/2020/03/12/phase-2-maintainedtransition-to-the-federal-phase-and-additional-measures/ (2020)

Belgium.name: Case-based measures
Belgium.description: Everyone should stay at home if experiencing a cough or fever.
sources: Federal Public Service. Protect yourself and protect the others. https://www.infocoronavirus.be/en/2020/03/10/protect-yourself-and-protect-the-others/ (2020)
